column1: The government is secretly adding microchips to vaccines to track citizens' movements and control their behavior through 5G networks.

column1: The unemployment rate in the United States fell to 3.4% in January 2023

column2: which includes provisions for climate change and healthcare.

column1: The economy is the strongest it has ever been in American history.
